gitHubHome.title: Welcome to Stefano Notaro profile page

description.line1: The purpose of this profile is to guide you to my differents repositories in github.
description.line2: This page is organized as follow:
description.line3: On the first section are all my github’s organizations. There I have all the repositories from the same technology.
description.line4: Ex: In “Angular Repositories” you will see all my Angular repositories, with a link to get into the organization.
description.line6: Here is a direct link to the repositories. This ones are organized by organization.
